text: As certain reactions to Kamala Harris and Dr. Jill Biden demonstrate, women’s experiences of ﬁrst having their credentials ignored and then being mocked if they assert them is all too familiar. https://t.co/g0qxyfQjiI

text: The mind “is the true canvas on which we design—not the screen,” the legendary game creator Shigeru Miyamoto says. “That’s something I always keep in mind when designing games.” https://t.co/j02b1noCDF
